name: Criticality
description:
Design a reactor to generate as much power as possible, but be careful not to overload your components and cause a reactor meltdown!

Unlock 15 components to make your reactor the biggest and most efficient in town.

Features

  • Fluid simulation for water & steam pressure
  • Almost Real™ reactor physics that are so close to real life you will be placed on a watchlist!
  • Watch thousands of dollars of infrastructure  and hours of effort be destroyed in seconds due to core meltdown!
  • Contains esoteric wisdom

This game uses a fairly slow internal simulation for the fluids involved.  I recommend downloading the Windows build for significantly improved performance over the WebGL build.
